attributes.action: Open discussions with EU member countries with a view to bringing back the death penalty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The ever increasing levels of knife and gun related murders are of concern to many people. Re-introduction of the death penalty would also deter the gangs of feral teenagers who like to attack older folk.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
